name: Win32 Tutorial
tagline: This page contains Windows programming resources for the beginner and intermediate windows programmer.
body:
# Win32 Programming Hi there! My name is Pravin Paratey and welcome to my spot on the web. This page contains Windows programming resources for the beginner and intermediate windows programmer. If you're new to windows programming, take a look around. ## Table of Contents * [Introduction](/win32/introduction) * [Lesson 1 - Your first win32 application](/win32/lesson1) * [Lesson 2 - Creating a basic window](/win32/lesson2) * [Lesson 3 - Resources: Icons, Dialogs and Menus](/win32/lesson3) * [Lesson 4 - Code Documentation and Code Versioning](/win32/lesson4) * [Lesson 5 - Adding standard GUI elements](/win32/lesson5) * [Feedback](/win32/feedback) Thank you!
  • Start
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
